title: Silver Zakat
description: Silver zakat is obligatory when the silver owned reaches the nisab of 595 grams and has been owned for one full year (haul).
calculation: Zakat = (Silver Weight - Nisab) × Silver Price per Gram × 2.5%
conditions: Silver reaches the minimum nisab of 595 grams
Has been owned for one full year (haul)
It is stored silver or investment silver
